name: Dungeon King (GameFavorites)
description:
You are a king that is trapped in the dungeon of his own castle. Your fancy gold sword is bent out of shape when you fell inside but luckily you find some dynamite. So you combine them together to give yourself a unique ability - you put the BOOM in boomerang!

Controls

  • Press Arrow keys to  move left, move right and jump
  • Press Z to throw a Sword Boomerang
  • Press X to explode the dynamite attached to the Sword Boomerang
  • Press R to restart the level

Goal

Escape the dungeon

Features (so far)

  • A boomerang sword that can be thrown and detonated at will
  • A destructible environment

Side Note

This game is currently in development and is being made using Construct 3. It is also entered into the GDKO 2022 game jam
